thread.section_title: PickleballCentral Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PickleballCentral | pickleballcentral.com | 3 of 114
thread.title: Deb

author: Deb
title: Deb
text:
I ordered the portable net--saw it on sale online but I called to be sure of what I was getting & to check on the delivery date. The oerson on the line was friendly. helpful and honest. I phoned the company again to order another net--wanted to get it at the sale price after the sale was over--a manager called me back promptly and though I didn't get the sale price, the person was nice, gave suggestions, and was orofessional. I can't ask for more!
Good product, good service--can't beat that!
